item.description: Try asking her a question on video or just show up to heckle her about her bad foreign policy decisions. Wing it people.... I may not show up unless somebody teams up with me to come up with a plan of action. I like to make videos. Check out my youtube.com/wearechangeboston for ideas about what I like to do. Message me if you want to get involved. -Mark A Conversation with Madeleine Albright April 26, 2012 6:00 PM - 7:30 PM Madeleine Albright discusses her memoir, Prague Winter: A Personal Story of Remembrance and War, 1937-1948, with Ambassador Nicholas Burns, professor at Harvard University’s Kennedy School of Government. Please add this to your calendar for an automatic reminder to view the webcast. Add to your Calendar

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 4/26 Protest - A Conversation with Madeleine Albright
